participant_1.background:
My home is wherever I'm sharing my wit.
I give my dog a big hug and some breakfast before I leave for work.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
I've broken many things because of my clumsiness.
I love to watch the deer on my vacation to Lake Michigan.

participant_2.background:
I'm maintaining a healthy weight by surfing often and eating a balanced diet.
I like to sharpen my blade and practice my sword skills in my free time.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
my sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when i m getting married.

content.text: I am a bit clumsy and I have broken many things.  How about you?
I am very careful and rarely break anything.  I am a bit of a martial artist, so I have a lot of experience with weapons, including swords.
It sounds like you are very skilled with a sword.
I like to think so.  I practice my sword skills every day.
What do you do for a living?
I am a scientist.  I love to learn about the universe and everything in it.
That sounds like a fascinating job.  I love to learn about the universe too.
It is a great job.  I get to do what I love every day.
That is awesome.  I do not have a job that I love.
You should find a job that you are passionate about.  It makes all the difference.
I am trying.  I am not sure what I want to do with my life.
It takes time to figure out what you want to do.  Just keep exploring your interests and you will eventually find your passion.
Thank you for the advice.  I will keep exploring.
You are welcome.  I am happy to help.
